backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI config with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two high-confidence features focused on restoring surgery case data rendering on the Dashboard and Cases list pages by fixing React Query hook wiring and prop passing.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated one-line summaries of all frontend source files describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, hook, utility, and type definition in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, chart palette, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw PWA, referencing the app icon, web manifest, theme color meta tags, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, display mode, theme/background colors, and icon assets at multiple resolutions.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy with precaching of the app shell on install, old cache cleanup on activate, and runtime caching of static assets while bypassing auth and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and sticky header with login button.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG workflow icon component for the Culture task type, rendering three small circles inside a larger circle using the culture workflow color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Discharge Notes task, rendering a document rectangle with a checkmark polyline using the discharge color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Follow-Up task, rendering a circular arrow with a corner polyline using the followup color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Histopathology task, rendering a microscope-like shape using the histo color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Imaging task, rendering a framed chart/waveform shape using the imaging color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Labs task, rendering a test tube shape with a horizontal line using the labs color token.
Renders a speech-bubble SVG icon for the 'notified' workflow state using WorkflowIconBase with the notified color token.
Renders a scalpel/document SVG icon for the 'surgery' workflow state using WorkflowIconBase with the surgery color token.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Maps task type strings to their corresponding icon components and exports a WorkflowIcon component that renders the correct icon for a given type.
Base SVG wrapper component that applies shared icon size, stroke width, and color to all workflow icons.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Defines shared design tokens for workflow icons including colors for each task type, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file intended to hold an authentication context provider.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Empty file intended to hold the authentication view component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing loading state and clearing React Query cache on logout.
Empty file intended to hold a login form component.
Empty file intended to hold a logout button component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their name and saves it as their profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Re: Empty file intended to hold a registration form component.
frontend/src/features/auth/validation.ts: Empty file intended to hold authentication-related validation logic.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the CHECKLIST_ITEMS configuration array for all surgical task types and exports helper functions to get default selections, remaining incomplete items, and color/icon metadata by workflow type.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Empty file intended to hold a camera capture modal component.
Expandable card component displaying a surgery case's patient info, remaining checklist tasks, and actions for toggling task completion, editing, and deleting the case.
Dialog form for editing an existing surgery case's patient details, dates, and task checklist selections, submitting changes via the updateCase mutation.
Dialog form for creating a new surgery case with fields for patient info, task selections, quick-fill text parsing, and optional speech recognition input.

Main list view component for surgery cases that combines search, filtering (species, tasks), sorting, and displays case cards with loading/error states. Manages all filter/sort state and computes the filtered/sorted case list via useMemo.
Controlled search input component with a search icon and a clear (X) button that resets the query when clicked.
Dropdown select control for choosing a sort option from the predefined SORT_OPTIONS list, displaying an ArrowUpDown icon alongside the selector.
Popover filter component for selecting one or more species (canine, feline, other) using checkboxes, with selection state persisted to sessionStorage.
Popover filter component for filtering cases by incomplete task types and a 'show all tasks completed' toggle, with state persisted to sessionStorage.
Renders a checklist of selected task items for a given Task, allowing toggling of completion state via checkboxes with workflow icons and strikethrough styling.
Panel component providing CSV export of all cases and CSV import that creates or updates cases in the backend, with progress tracking and error reporting via toasts.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: Controlled date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY entry with auto-slash insertion and a calendar popover picker, with blur validation and auto-advance on complete entry.
Provides functions to export surgery cases to a CSV file and import cases from a CSV file, including row parsing, validation, and error collection.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV column headers, TypeScript row type, and validation constants (valid species, sex, boolean, and date format) for veterinary surgery case import/export.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Exports utility functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, incomplete tasks, or fully completed tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the browser Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, transcript accumulation, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts to produce cleaner text for further parsing.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object by mapping recognized field labels to their corresponding typed values.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a styled HTML report of surgery cases that have at least one incomplete task, using a hidden iframe.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases, including patient details and remaining checklist tasks, with proper CSV escaping and a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utility functions for PDF display, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex values to human-readable strings, plus text truncation and task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utility functions for CSV report output, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex values to human-readable strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of surgery cases by a search query, matching against patient/owner fields and incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts surgery cases by arrival date or number of remaining open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constant option arrays for Species and Sex dropdowns, and the CaseFormData interface used for surgery case form state.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields (MRN, pet name, owner name, breed) and date conversion/parsing utilities between Date objects, nanoseconds, and MM/DD/YYYY strings.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: React component that renders the main dashboard, displaying surgery cases with search, filter, sort controls, summary stats, and a new case dialog, using React Query for data fetching.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open task items from a surgery case and calculate the total count of remaining tasks across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the debounced value after the delay has elapsed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state and persisting identity across page reloads using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on surgery cases, tasks, user profiles, dashboard data, and OpenAI config, all wired to the backend canister actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light-mode design system, including semantic color tokens for cards, complaints, notes, and species fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for OCR workers, recognition results, and enums for page segmentation and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends border radius and font family, and registers the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for SurgiPaw describing a known bug where surgery cases render as a blank list on Dashboard and Cases pages after a v95 UI refactor, with two fix-request features targeting prop/query wiring issues.
